summary.span: 注册一个用于处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]事件的方法。

span.span: Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些类，如、 公开字段标识特定于类的事件。Some classes, such as , expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class. 方法提供了一种机制，使你能够注册这些事件处理程序。The method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events. `eventHandler` 可以是实例方法或对方法的引用 (`AddressOf`在 Visual Basic 中)。`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).

span.span: Compares the specified parameters to determine whether they refer to the same user interface (UI) element.

.method public static hidebysig void RemoveAutomationEventHandler(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent eventId, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler eventHandler) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RemoveAutomationEventHandler (eventId As AutomationEvent, element As AutomationElement, eventHandler As AutomationEventHandler)

public: static void RemoveAutomationEventHandler(System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEvent ^ eventId, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationElement ^ element, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEventHandler ^ eventHandler);
static member RemoveAutomationEventHandler : System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent * System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement * System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler -> unit

param.name: eventId
param.span: 事件标识符。

span.span: An event identifier.

param.name: element
param.span: 将移除其上的事件处理程序的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element on which to remove the event handler.

param.name: eventHandler
param.span: 传递到指定事件标识符和 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的 的处理程序方法。

summary.span: 移除指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler.
